ofx:section.ofx:title: Roles
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: The roles administration page describes the function of a single person in this system and grants them permission. Roles are divided into specific categories and you get a list of the existing roles per category. It is possible to add separate views, actions and use cases for each role by clicking on the green add button located at the top of each rule-type. After changing rights and permissions for a role, save the new role configuration. These changes takes effect after the edited user logs in to the system.
